1: <pb/><t>Calc yuj diosal 'a Jehová yujto wach' snab'en, a schamc'ojlal 'ayn̈ec may slajub'.</t>
2: <t>Calc an̈ israel on̈c tic, to a schamc'ojlal Dios may slajub'.</t>
3: <t>Yal cab' eb' yin̈tl Aarón, to a schamc'ojlal Dios may slajub'.</t>
4: <t>Yal cab' eb' yiclum 'a Jehová, to a schamc'ojlal Dios may slajub'.</t>
5: <pb/><t>A yic 'ayn 'och 'a in yailal, 'ix waln in b'a 'a Jehová, 'ix yab' tas xwal 'a 'a, yuj cha, in scolni.</t>
6: <t>A 'ayc' wet'oc, yuj cha, matz in xiw yuj tas tzin yutj eb' wit 'anma'il.</t>
7: <t>Wojtac to 'ayc' wet'oc, a tzcolwj 'ayin. 'Oj wila', tas tz'aj slajw 'el eb' 'anma tzin chacn 'eli.</t>
8: <t>Yel xo wach' tzca'c 'och Jehová yipc qui c'ojol, 'a yib'n̈ to a eb' 'anma 'aj tzca'c 'och qui c'ojol.</t>
9: <t>Caw wal wach' tzca'c 'och Jehová yipc qui c'ojol, 'a yib'n̈ to a eb' yajl 'aj tzca'c 'och qui c'ojol.</t>
10: <pb/><t>'Ix 'och oyn eb' niwc nacion̈ 'ayin, palta yuj yip Jehová 'ix wa'n ganar eb' in satn 'eli.</t>
11: <t>'Ix 'och wal oyn eb' 'ayn smasnil, palta yuj yip Jehová xwa'n ganar in satn 'el eb'.</t>
12: <t>'Ix 'och oyn eb' 'ayn 'icha no sno'l 'acan̈, ax yowl sc'ojl eb' chi 'ayin, 'ix tup 'icha tzyac' te c'ac' 'a scal q'ui'ix; yuj scolwal Jehová 'ix wa'n ganar in satn 'el eb'.</t>
13: <t>In cob' yec telwc eb', sec tzin 'em yuj eb' snani, palta ax Jehová in colni.</t>
14: <t>Yuj cha, tzin b'itn 'a 'a, yujto a wip yaji. A 'in Colmal yaji.</t>
15: <pb/><t>A b'it yic tzaljc'ojlal a chi 'ay 'a yatut eb' tojl snab'en. Yuj sjelnal Jehová 'ix ya'n ganar eb' owal.</t>
16: <t>Caw wal niwquil spoder, yuj spoder caw satjub'tac 'ix 'aj ya'n ganar owal.</t>
17: <t>Ma'oj in cham muc'uc, palta pitzn in to, sec 'oj wal-li to satjub'tac tas tzb'o Jehová.</t>
18: <t>Caw niwquil in yailal 'ix ya'chi, palta ma'in schaj chamoc.</t>
19: <pb/><t>Jacx cab' spuertail yatut Dios 'ayin, yujto tzin nib'j tzin 'och 'a yojol, yic tzwa'n yuj diosal 'a 'a.</t>
20: <t>A 'a jun puerta cha, ata tzon̈ 'ochec yic tzon̈ c'ochc 'a yojltac; ata 'oj cochc an̈ tojl qui nab'enec.</t>
21: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, 'oj wac' yuj diosal 'ayach, yujto 'ix ab' tas xwala, in Colmal pax aji.</t>
22: <t>A q'uen q'uen 'ix spatquilj can 'el eb' b'om n̈a, atn q'uen 'ix wach' 'ajx 'och yopiso.</t>
23: <t>Ach 'ixta 'ix otj jun tic, caw tzsat qui c'ojl quilni.</t>
24: <t>Atn 'a jun c'u tic 'ix 'el'ch tas nab'il oj Mamin Jehová; yuj cha, wach' quic on̈, tzon̈ tzalj o'oj.</t>
25: <t>Tzin tew 'och 'aych Mamin to tzach colwj quet' ticnec on̈. Colwjan̈ sec wach' tzon̈ 'el'ch can on̈.</t>
26: <t>Alx cab' wach' paxti 'a mach checb'il cot yuj Jehová. A 'a yatut Dios ata 'oj cal wach' paxti 'ayex.</t>
27: <t>A Jehová Dios ton b'i'an, a 'ix a'n sacq'uinl 'ayn̈ec. Qui nac sq'uin̈al, tzqui'nec te sc'ab' te yet' xi'il, tzon̈ oyyec' 'a spatquil yet'l xajmb'al.</t>
28: <pb/><t>Ach qui Diosal on̈, tzcal yuj diosal 'ayach, yujto niwn el'chi. Smoj caln qui wach' paxti 'ayach.</t>
29: <pb/><t>¡Alx cab' wach' paxti 'a Jehová, yujto wach' snab'en! A schamc'ojlal 'ayn̈ec may slajub'.</t>
